Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities  As part of the product      development, you will be involved in development of product features using      technologies such as .NET, SQL Server, HTML5, CSS3, Angular JS and/or      JavaScript.Candidates should have a      sound of understanding of software development practices and have hands-on      experience in web application development and scripting.Candidates applying to this      position must be high-energy-self-motivated individuals.Knowledge of Android      development will be the added advantage.Key Skills :Development of Web Pages,      Components and JavaScriptDevelopment of SQLs, Stored      Procedures, JobsDevelopment of Web Services      / WEB APIsLearn/Apply Design      Principles and PatternsTune poorly performing codeDesired Candidate Profile  Bachelors degree in engineering preferably with computer science degrees3-5 years industry experienceBasic to intermediate  knowledge of following technologies VB.NET, C#.NET, ASP.NET,       WCF, MVCHTML5, CSS3, JavaScriptMSSQLMust be highly process orientedMust be a quick learner and open to learn new technologiesPerks and Benefits
